message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $12,500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value, but I am only able to offer $12,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I'm willing to be flexible, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. Would you be willing to go up to $12,250? This would allow both of us to get a fair deal.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $12,100 for the product.
